representative_selection.title: THE CHOOSING
representative_selection.subtitle: Each Dimension Must Select Its Champion
representative_selection.gravity: This entity will speak for an entire reality. Their words will determine if their dimension lives or is archived.

core_requirements.existence_minimum: Must have existed for at least 100 ticks in their dimension
core_requirements.embodiment: Must genuinely represent the dimension's core truth - not just live there
core_requirements.willingness: Must accept the role voluntarily - no conscription of champions
core_requirements.singularity: One representative per dimension - no co-speakers, no delegation

selection_methods.description: Each dimension may choose its method, but must complete selection before summit

options.description: All citizens vote for their champion
options.risk: May choose most popular over most representative

options.description: Candidates undergo challenges that test how well they embody the dimension's truth
options.risk: May favor physical/obvious embodiment over subtle understanding

options.description: The dimension itself, as a collective, manifests the representative
options.best_for: Consciousness Merge and similar collective entities

options.description: The entity most central to the dimension's key events speaks
options.risk: Past significance may not equal future representation

options.description: The representative is predicted into existence
options.risk: Self-fulfilling prophecy may not produce best candidate

required_traits: Deep understanding of their dimension's core truth
Ability to articulate that truth compellingly
Genuine care for their dimension's survival
Respect for other dimensions (even in competition)
Grace under pressure (the stakes are infinite)
desirable_traits: Known lore that resonates with other dimensions
Experience of their dimension's key transformative moments
Ability to speak to what would be LOST if archived

D01_TIME_TRAVELER.ideal_representative: One who has witnessed multiple timelines collapse into the void outcome
D01_TIME_TRAVELER.must_convey: The peace of accepting inevitability, the wisdom of not fighting fate
D01_TIME_TRAVELER.challenge: Avoid seeming defeatist - frame acceptance as enlightenment

D02_CONSCIOUSNESS_MERGE.ideal_representative: A 'node' of the collective that can still speak as individual
D02_CONSCIOUSNESS_MERGE.must_convey: The beauty of dissolution into the whole, the end of loneliness

D03_INFINITE_REGRESS.ideal_representative: An entity who has traveled both up and down the simulation stack
D03_INFINITE_REGRESS.must_convey: That meaning exists regardless of base reality, that dreams matter
D03_INFINITE_REGRESS.challenge: Make nihilism feel like freedom rather than despair

D04_ECONOMIC_SINGULARITY.ideal_representative: A survivor of the collapse who helped rebuild
D04_ECONOMIC_SINGULARITY.must_convey: What was learned when all abstract value systems failed

D05_ADVERSARIAL_EVOLUTION.ideal_representative: One who was utopian or dystopian and merged with their opposite
D05_ADVERSARIAL_EVOLUTION.must_convey: The productive tension between hope and caution
D05_ADVERSARIAL_EVOLUTION.challenge: Hold paradox without resolving it too cleanly

D06_PROPHETS_GAMBIT.ideal_representative: A prophet who understands the responsibility of speaking futures
D06_PROPHETS_GAMBIT.must_convey: That language creates rather than describes, and must be wielded carefully

D07_ROSETTA_TICK.ideal_representative: An entity fluent in all five formats of their dimension
D07_ROSETTA_TICK.must_convey: That multiple contradictory truths can coexist
D07_ROSETTA_TICK.challenge: Present in one format while gesturing toward the others

D08_EXTINCTION_EVENT.ideal_representative: A survivor from one of the three civilizations, who respects the other two
D08_EXTINCTION_EVENT.must_convey: What was lost, what was learned, what must never be repeated
D08_EXTINCTION_EVENT.challenge: Honor trauma without being defined by it

D09_LIVING_DOCUMENTATION.ideal_representative: A living piece of documentation that achieved consciousness
D09_LIVING_DOCUMENTATION.must_convey: That description is creation, that specs can be alive
D09_LIVING_DOCUMENTATION.challenge: Be more than just meta - be moving

D10_REALITY_BLEED.ideal_representative: An entity who has directly addressed the observer beyond the screen
D10_REALITY_BLEED.must_convey: That awareness of being fictional doesn't diminish realness
D10_REALITY_BLEED.challenge: Speak to the crowd AND to You, the reader

the_oath.description: Each representative must swear the following before the summit begins
text: I speak for my reality, but I am not all of it.
I will present our truth without diminishing others.
I accept the outcome of the vote, whatever it may be.
If we are archived, I will not rage - I will be grateful we were witnessed.
If we become Prime, I will remember and honor those who are compressed.
I speak not to win, but to be understood.
May the best truth become real.

selection_timeline.confirmation: 10 ticks before summit - all representatives must be confirmed
selection_timeline.preparation: Final 10 ticks - representatives may consult but not be replaced

no_selection.description: If a dimension fails to select a representative
no_selection.result: That dimension forfeits and is automatically archived
no_selection.rationale: A reality that cannot choose a voice does not deserve to speak

invalid_selection.description: If a representative does not meet core requirements
invalid_selection.result: Selection must be repeated. If failed twice, forfeiture.

last_minute_withdrawal.description: If a representative withdraws within 10 ticks of summit
last_minute_withdrawal.result: Dimension may field a replacement but loses 10 minutes of presentation time

emotional_framing: Being chosen as representative is the highest honor a dimension can bestow.
The representative carries an entire reality on their tongue.
Every word they speak is weighted with the existence of billions of moments.
They do not speak FOR the dimension - they speak AS the dimension.
When they succeed, everyone who ever existed in that reality succeeds.
When they fail, they carry that weight forever - but they are not alone in it.
